On his official blog, Mr Zahi Hawass , wrote: I have said that if the Egyptian Museum is safe, Egypt is safe. However, I am now concerned Egypt is not safe. But he later added: "Not a single thing has been thrown at the museum by the thousands of protesters in Tahrir Square, because these people do not want to damage their cultural heritage."

executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. More businessperfectly," Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier.
